parent.body:
> You're asking for proof yet you won't prove your own arguments

What did I just say about you knowing nothing about debates? lmfao

You don't "prove" arguments, you prove assertions, premises. Arguments can either be valid or invalid, not true or false, ergo you can't "prove" them.

You'd know this if you weren't an edgy 14 year old (which would also explain why you think women are smarter, since, generally speaking, between the ages of 11 and 15, they are)

> The problem is it's impossible to "prove" these matters one way or the other

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/post/7d6m/UeKj7ms8SF8)

1) That's a flagrant lie

2) I wouldn't need to prove a negative

3) Burden of proof falls on you, you're making the assertion contradictory to established scientific data

4) What you can assert without evidence I can dismiss without evidence

> had 

I didn't "have" to, I just got tired of your dumb shit.

> myself to have won the argument

In your dreams, faggot.

You'd know this if you weren't an edgy 14 year old (which would also explain why you think women are smarter, since, generally speaking, between the ages of 11 and 15, they are)

The problem is it's impossible to "prove" these matters one way or the other

  1. That's a flagrant lie

  2. I wouldn't need to prove a negative

  3. Burden of proof falls on you, you're making the assertion contradictory to established scientific data

In your dreams, faggot.

post.body:
More marriages lasted, kids were raised by their mothers instead of the state, homes were cleaner and better administered, women and men were happier, quality of life was considerably better. 

Now the hens abandon the nest as soon as they can just to preen and chase shiny objects that make them feel like they have some type of control. 

If we were any other animal, scientists would be alarmed at our behavior.  We are devolving in real time.
post.body_html:
More marriages lasted, kids were raised by their mothers instead of the state, homes were cleaner and better administered, women and men were happier, quality of life was considerably better.

Now the hens abandon the nest as soon as they can just to preen and chase shiny objects that make them feel like they have some type of control.

If we were any other animal, scientists would be alarmed at our behavior. We are devolving in real time.

body:
> We know that hormones over time change the physical structure of the brain, but would a male brain on estrogen still be a male brain? Do you think that because of the chromosomes, it would still respond the way a 'male wired brain' would?

For the most part, yes. And estrogen does little to the brain (as female is the default state) and the effects of testosterone are irreversible. This is why it's basically impossible for trannies to go MtF, while FtM is barely noticeable.

There are some creative men but they are an anomaly. For the vast majority of people, your brain is structured by your sex, and studies have proven it to be completely different. Males specialize in physical/spatial skills and women specialize in thinking, which is perfectly utilitarian, just not fair.
body_html:
We know that hormones over time change the physical structure of the brain, but would a male brain on estrogen still be a male brain? Do you think that because of the chromosomes, it would still respond the way a 'male wired brain' would?

For the most part, yes. And estrogen does little to the brain (as female is the default state) and the effects of testosterone are irreversible. This is why it's basically impossible for trannies to go MtF, while FtM is barely noticeable.

There are some creative men but they are an anomaly. For the vast majority of people, your brain is structured by your sex, and studies have proven it to be completely different. Males specialize in physical/spatial skills and women specialize in thinking, which is perfectly utilitarian, just not fair.

guild.description: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.description_html: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.name: UnpopularOpinion

parent.body:
>  male and female [brains] are wired and built completely differently

Oh hoh? And you know this because it's the common understanding, someone has told you, or because you understand the brain?

We know that hormones over time change the physical structure of the brain, but would a male brain on estrogen still be a male brain? Do you think that because of the chromosomes, it would still respond the way a 'male wired brain' would?

> boys tend to lose their creativity and joyfulness

Tend? If it's wired completely differently, then why isn't it *every* boy?

> they trade in their talent in logic and creativity

Interesting that the entire world of mathematics rests on the foundation of logic, and yet the majority of the foundation was laid by "uncreative" "unlogical" adult males... Crazy.

I'll stop with the cattyness here. You are making "common sense" assumptions that have been influenced not by careful understand and study of neural biology, but by your social upbringing. You repeat you assumptions as if they are fact, when you don't fully understand what you are talking about. There is so much wrong with your almost baseless claims I can't even begin to fully dissect it without writing a thesis paper. Please back up your claims with hard evidence or keep it to yourself.
parent.body_html:
male and female [brains] are wired and built completely differently

Oh hoh? And you know this because it's the common understanding, someone has told you, or because you understand the brain?

We know that hormones over time change the physical structure of the brain, but would a male brain on estrogen still be a male brain? Do you think that because of the chromosomes, it would still respond the way a 'male wired brain' would?

boys tend to lose their creativity and joyfulness

Tend? If it's wired completely differently, then why isn't it every boy?

they trade in their talent in logic and creativity

Interesting that the entire world of mathematics rests on the foundation of logic, and yet the majority of the foundation was laid by "uncreative" "unlogical" adult males... Crazy.

I'll stop with the cattyness here. You are making "common sense" assumptions that have been influenced not by careful understand and study of neural biology, but by your social upbringing. You repeat you assumptions as if they are fact, when you don't fully understand what you are talking about. There is so much wrong with your almost baseless claims I can't even begin to fully dissect it without writing a thesis paper. Please back up your claims with hard evidence or keep it to yourself.

guild.description:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

guild.name: Christianity

parent.body: I wasn't converted by a church, but that aside: I don't deny that religious ideas ought to be taught through different means in different contexts, but bowing out of long-held traditions, practices and principles to pander to a crowd who'd never convert anyway is just self-destructive for the religion. For example, a Marxist reading of The Bible could be attempted, but would do nobody any good, and it would be neither marxist, nor Christian. We'd do well as Christians to maintain a conviction and sureness of belief that exists beyond mere ideology.

parent.body:
I don't hate every Jewish individual and I don't wish to harm your random "regular guy" Jew who is minding his own business running a kosher deli or practicing dentistry. There are Jews I like and admire, such as Jonas Salk or John Milius.

I strongly dislike the clique of Jewish plutocrats who dominate American politics. 

Trump's largest donor was outspoken Zionist Sheldon Adelson

https://www.haaretz.com/us-news/.premium-adelson-reportedly-watches-election-with-trump-1.6632299

Clinton's largest donor was Israeli national Haim Saban, who owns the Spanish language television channel Univision

https://www.politico.com/story/2016/11/haim-saban-hillary-clinton-donor-230711

Saban with Pelosi and Schumer (who is also Jewish) at AIPAC

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U1LmnQRnw8I

Of the $675 million given by the top 50 donors, 66 percent of the money came from Jews and 34 percent from gentiles.

Of the $297 million that GOP candidates and conservative causes received from the top 50 donors, 56 percent was from Jewish individuals.

Of the $361 million Democratic politicians and liberal causes received, 76 percent came from Jewish givers.

http://archive.is/KvgBj

7/8 of the largest democratic donors are ethnic Jews

https://nymag.com/intelligencer/2019/08/most-influential-democratic-donors-2020-elections.html

Israel currently receives more aid than any nation except Iraq and Afghanistan

https://i.redd.it/0duem3aacv141.jpg

America has given Israel massive amounts of aid since its creation

https://www.haaretz.com/israel-news/business/.premium-u-s-aid-to-israel-234-billion-over-60-years-1.5234820

Israel sells our military tech to China

https://www.military.com/defensetech/2013/12/24/report-israel-passes-u-s-military-technology-to-china

Israeli newspapers openly blame Jewish American political advisers for the Iraq war

https://www.haaretz.com/1.4764706

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Clean_Break:_A_New_Strategy_for_Securing_the_Realm

Epstein was most likely running a blackmail operation for Mossad

Israeli prime minister Ehud Barak was close with Epstein

https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/politics-and-diplomacy/ehud-barak-crashed-at-epsteins-apt-regularly-neighbors-say-report-597820

https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/released-photos-show-barak-four-women-entering-epstein-house-report-595887

Barak also introduced Harvey Weinstein to Mossad agents who intimidated his abuse victims

https://www.timesofisrael.com/ehud-barak-referred-weinstein-to-ex-mossad-agents-he-hired-to-quash-allegations/

Maxwell's father was a Mossad agent who also died a very mysterious death

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Maxwell

Jewish Neocon guru Bill Kristol literally saying he wants to replace the White American working class with immigrants

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zks6WK1Hsok

Great video analyzing how Jewish Republican Ben Shapiro called for Arabs to be ethnically cleansed from Israel because "Demographics are destiny" but calls anyone who cares about America's radically changing demographics evil and ignorant

https://www.bitchute.com/video/w9D6lnnY1uiU/

George Soros's son Alex admits that his father pushes open borders and multiculturalism in order to advance Jewish interests:

Alex told me that for many years, his father had not been eager to advertise his Judaism because “this was something he was almost killed for.” But he had always “identified firstly as a Jew,” and his philanthropy was ultimately an expression of his Jewish identity, in that he felt a solidarity with other minority groups and also because he recognized that a Jew could only truly be safe in a world in which all minorities were protected. Explaining his father’s motives, he said, “The reason you fight for an open society is because that’s the only society that you can live in, as a Jew

http://archive.is/bJhw3#selection-753.597-753.1187   https://www.nytimes.com/2018/07/17/magazine/george-soros-democrat-open-society.html

Jewish authors brag that Jews control Hollywood then accuse any goy who makes the same statement of being an anti-Semitic conspiracy theorist

https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-2008-dec-19-oe-stein19-story.html

body: I think this also explains the historical suppression of women. Biologically male is the expendable sex, because one woman and 10 men can only have one child, but 10 women and one man can have 10 children. This results in men being stuck doing all the dirty work, laboring and going through all the brutal situations and risks, bearing all the responsibility but none of the rewards; slaves basically. And in any situation in society, the man's need are always the very last priority. Even their brains and bodies, are designed to make them better functionally with little regard to their own well-being. They are angry, unintelligent, and never content. The ONLY thing males are good at are physical strength and spatial skills, and they mostly lose everything else due to so much specialization in that area. Then they saw the women, angels who are smart, good looking and joyful, and actually cared for, and got jealous.

parent.body:
That's certainly part of it, but I think put more simply it also comes from jealousy. The one stat that really put the whole thing into perspective for me was when I learned the average IQ of Ashkenazi jews was like 120. That's a huge gap. It's no wonder they are highly successful people and when times get bad, the mob always go after highly successful people (out of jealousy) and **especially** if they're different.

How did Jews get so smart? I think it's from centuries of the sort of segregation you're talking about. They we'rent really permitted to operate in most areas of society in Europe, so they were forced to fill artificial vacuums created by the Catholic church, such as in the industry of money lending, which was literally illegal for Catholics.

So they were essentially the first regulatory-enforced members of the white-collar class. They've done well, and thus make an excellent scape goat.

body:
> All she has to claim to be is a “victim of sexual assault“ and she becomes untouchable, because the weakness of constantly carrying your baggage is now a virtue.

This is something any woman can do, and it's because they're the lucky ones. Nature has it that women are perfect angels that need protected at all costs. Men are perverts and always guilty. This isn't new, it's always been this way.

The rest of this has nothing to do with women. You act like just because there are a few of them involved, means that it's *women*, and not *those women*, who are the cause. Even though there are more men doing it.

This is something any woman can do, and it's because they're the lucky ones. Nature has it that women are perfect angels that need protected at all costs. Men are perverts and always guilty. This isn't new, it's always been this way.

The rest of this has nothing to do with women. You act like just because there are a few of them involved, means that it's women, and not those women, who are the cause. Even though there are more men doing it.

parent.body:
That would be an interesting theory if I didn’t have eyes, ears, and a brain. 

Women are probably the single biggest force behind the rapid decline of the West right now. They’ve made the workplace more rigid and cold, less friendly and communal, and turned what used to be a sort of community of brotherhood into a despotic nightmare where everyone is playing politics, screwing each other over, and treating everyone like shit. 

Women have been behind modern movements to make weakness, jealousy, and insecurity into virtues. Look at someone like AOC who gets caught having the constitution of a 10 year old during the capital riot. All she has to claim to be is a “victim of sexual assault“ and she becomes untouchable, because the weakness of constantly carrying your baggage is now a virtue. 

Participation ribbons, HR departments, affirmative action - all of this is due to women. And of course they still aren’t happy (no surprise) and we still need to constantly hear about how they’re oppressed.  

We have seen about 40 years of women being at the table and it’s hard to say things have gotten better. Little boys are considered rapists by default, the insanity of “toxic masculinity” (a fundamentally sexist idea) is taken seriously in the mainstream, sports stars and actors politically lecture the population with impunity, and truth is now ancillary to feelings and narrative.

I laugh hysterically now when I hear a woman suggest that if the world was run by them there would be no war. We’d almost certainly be in perpetual wars over nonsense like whether or not enough men who like to wear dresses are represented in government.
parent.body_html:
That would be an interesting theory if I didn’t have eyes, ears, and a brain.

Women are probably the single biggest force behind the rapid decline of the West right now. They’ve made the workplace more rigid and cold, less friendly and communal, and turned what used to be a sort of community of brotherhood into a despotic nightmare where everyone is playing politics, screwing each other over, and treating everyone like shit.

Women have been behind modern movements to make weakness, jealousy, and insecurity into virtues. Look at someone like AOC who gets caught having the constitution of a 10 year old during the capital riot. All she has to claim to be is a “victim of sexual assault“ and she becomes untouchable, because the weakness of constantly carrying your baggage is now a virtue.

Participation ribbons, HR departments, affirmative action - all of this is due to women. And of course they still aren’t happy (no surprise) and we still need to constantly hear about how they’re oppressed.

We have seen about 40 years of women being at the table and it’s hard to say things have gotten better. Little boys are considered rapists by default, the insanity of “toxic masculinity” (a fundamentally sexist idea) is taken seriously in the mainstream, sports stars and actors politically lecture the population with impunity, and truth is now ancillary to feelings and narrative.

I laugh hysterically now when I hear a woman suggest that if the world was run by them there would be no war. We’d almost certainly be in perpetual wars over nonsense like whether or not enough men who like to wear dresses are represented in government.

parent.body:
It is only a correlation, but it’s a pretty good one. As soon as women entered the workforce the world seemed to lose its mind. Political correctness has infested every single aspect of our culture now. You can’t even escape it working in an oil field or a coal mine these days. 

Men spent centuries eliminating discrimination, and women took about two decades to bring it back in force. The Prime Minister of Canada literally bragged about have a cabinet with a 50/50 gender makeup. Yes, now a prime qualification for public office is your genitalia. 

Your skin colour is also now a qualification. Make a rude comment? You could get fired. Post something politically controversial on your personal Facebook page? You’re a pariah. 

It’s no wonder this is happening now. Our society basically works like the friendship dynamic of The Desperate Housewives. If you do something against the group, or even think in a way the group doesn’t like, they will bully, tease, and ostracize you out of everything. Your job, all your social media, and increasingly even your ability to use payment platforms or online commerce. They will completely destroy you and then consider themselves benevolent for doing so. 

Men do not do this, it’s a woman thing. Women have taken over the universities, they are starting to dominate the media, and they are rapidly starting to control politics. Look at every one of these institutions and tell me: has it gotten better? No. Each one of those industries is a hyper-active example of exactly how women operate in groups - this Desperate Housewives dynamic that seems to be infesting everything. Where the ends always justifies the means, there is no tactic used against outsiders that is off limits, and the only way to find virtue is through complete conformity to the status quo. 

Women are literally ruining society - sorry, but it’s true. Give women power and the world would be better? Lmao. Not even close. All  they’ve demonstrated so far is they have no idea how to handle power properly. In the aggregate they are proving to be petty, bullying, superficial tyrants.

Men spent centuries eliminating discrimination, and women took about two decades to bring it back in force. The Prime Minister of Canada literally bragged about have a cabinet with a 50/50 gender makeup. Yes, now a prime qualification for public office is your genitalia.

Your skin colour is also now a qualification. Make a rude comment? You could get fired. Post something politically controversial on your personal Facebook page? You’re a pariah.

It’s no wonder this is happening now. Our society basically works like the friendship dynamic of The Desperate Housewives. If you do something against the group, or even think in a way the group doesn’t like, they will bully, tease, and ostracize you out of everything. Your job, all your social media, and increasingly even your ability to use payment platforms or online commerce. They will completely destroy you and then consider themselves benevolent for doing so.

Men do not do this, it’s a woman thing. Women have taken over the universities, they are starting to dominate the media, and they are rapidly starting to control politics. Look at every one of these institutions and tell me: has it gotten better? No. Each one of those industries is a hyper-active example of exactly how women operate in groups - this Desperate Housewives dynamic that seems to be infesting everything. Where the ends always justifies the means, there is no tactic used against outsiders that is off limits, and the only way to find virtue is through complete conformity to the status quo.

Women are literally ruining society - sorry, but it’s true. Give women power and the world would be better? Lmao. Not even close. All they’ve demonstrated so far is they have no idea how to handle power properly. In the aggregate they are proving to be petty, bullying, superficial tyrants.

parent.body:
Yes I think it’s women. Their “mean girls” ideology has gone mainstream enough that they are finding male allies now, but it’s definitely due to the slow and steady feminization of our society. 

Mean girls is a very appropriate analogy here. Every time you see one of these strange censorship or politically correct situations that seems insane, think about it from the perspective of a group of mean girls in a highschool and it will all make sense.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

post.body: >This is why the message declared is always *repent and believe*. America, apart from repentance, is a haunt for owls and jackals. And evangelical America, apart from repentance, has taken to shilling for owls and jackals. The central sin that must be repented is the sin of envy. This is the sin that is driving all of this. That is the Shelob living down inside the cavernous tunnels of our hearts.

body:
This is a myth. Many of the founding fathers were not believers and almost none of them were the great people we portray them as today. George Washington the character who couldn't tell a lie and hated tyranny is very far removed from the real one who supported tyrannical federal government, slavery, and censorship, and slaughtered his enemies. Others wanted a new monarchy (Hamilton), and some were known crooks (and Ben Franklin probably killed the person whose body was hidden in his basement). The only thing they had in common was that they didn't like King George III. Eventually they did agree on our constitution and checks on government power but only because a few of them fought for it.

The concept of a "Christian nation" is also false. That only happened one time ever, and it was NOT the United States. It was Israel, and even then they were not a good role model.
body_html:
This is a myth. Many of the founding fathers were not believers and almost none of them were the great people we portray them as today. George Washington the character who couldn't tell a lie and hated tyranny is very far removed from the real one who supported tyrannical federal government, slavery, and censorship, and slaughtered his enemies. Others wanted a new monarchy (Hamilton), and some were known crooks (and Ben Franklin probably killed the person whose body was hidden in his basement). The only thing they had in common was that they didn't like King George III. Eventually they did agree on our constitution and checks on government power but only because a few of them fought for it.

The concept of a "Christian nation" is also false. That only happened one time ever, and it was NOT the United States. It was Israel, and even then they were not a good role model.
